atDirectives.name: @theme
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 theme configuration directive. Use `@theme inline` to define CSS variables that integrate with Tailwind's theme system.

atDirectives.name: @source
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 source directive for specifying content paths.

atDirectives.name: @variant
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 variant directive for custom variants.

atDirectives.name: @custom-variant
atDirectives.description: Tailwind CSS v4 custom variant directive.
